member.name: XINPUT_GAMEPAD
member.summary: Describes the current state of the Xbox 360 Controller.

summary.para: Bitmask of the device digital buttons, as follows. A set bit indicates that the corresponding button is pressed.
Bits that are set but not defined above are reserved, and their state is undefined.

member.name: XINPUT_GAMEPAD.bLeftTrigger
member.summary: The current value of the left trigger analog control. The value is between 0 and 255.

member.name: XINPUT_GAMEPAD.bRightTrigger
member.summary: The current value of the right trigger analog control. The value is between 0 and 255.

member.name: XINPUT_GAMEPAD.sThumbLX
member.summary: Left thumbstick x-axis value. Each of the thumbstick axis members is a signed value between -32768 and 32767 describing the position of the thumbstick. A value of 0 is centered. Negative values signify down or to the left. Positive values signify up or to the right. The constants XINPUT_GAMEPAD_LEFT_THUMB_DEADZONE or XINPUT_GAMEPAD_RIGHT_THUMB_DEADZONE can be used as a positive and negative value to filter a thumbstick input.

member.name: XINPUT_GAMEPAD.sThumbLY
member.summary: Left thumbstick y-axis value. The value is between -32768 and 32767.

member.name: XINPUT_GAMEPAD.sThumbRX
member.summary: Right thumbstick x-axis value. The value is between -32768 and 32767.

member.name: XINPUT_GAMEPAD.sThumbRY
member.summary: Right thumbstick y-axis value. The value is between -32768 and 32767.
